titles.title: Black Bear Protection Act
A bill to prohibit the export of American black bear viscera, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S692-693)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary: 1/26/1993--Introduced. Black Bear Protection Act - Directs the Secretary of Commerce under the Export Administration Act of 1979 to prohibit the export of American black bear viscera. Requires the Secretary of the Interior to report to the Congress on the American black bear viscera trade. Requires the United States Trade Representative to discuss issues involving such trade with countries that are the leading importers of such products.
